Right Click on a Counter Top
Right Click on a Counter Top
Right Click On A Counter Top
There are 6 options when Right Clicking on a Counter Top:
image1212.gif
Delete
This menu option will delete the selected Counter Top.
Delete All
This menu option will delete all the Counter Tops in the current Room.
Edit Shape

This menu option allows you to edit the shape of your Counter Top by 
 bringing up the Shape Editor options.

Click 
 the options below for more information
Shape_Tools_1.png
Selecting a Line or Arc on a Counter Top

When selecting a Line or Arc on a Counter 
 Top you are presented with the following sidebar option specific to Counter 
 Tops:
image50.gif

Edge - Type -  Specifies the Edges 
		 Type. Following are the options here:

Edge - Type -  Specifies the Edges 
		 Type. Following are the options here:

		 Type. Following are the options here:

 Finished

 Profile 
			 -  This option allows you to specify an Edge on a Counter

 Splash

Add Cutout

The following graphic demonstrates the procedure required to place a 
 Cutout in a Counter Top.
Add_Cutout.png

By right clicking on your Counter Top, and selecting "Add Cutout" 
 the Counter Top Cutout window appears. The values that are placed in the 
 boxes of the cutout window are reflected in the small plan view shown 
 below the Counter Top cutout window. To view the cutout as it appears 
 on the Top, use the 3D view at the Room level.
Edit Top Splits
This menu option brings up the Split Editor options.

Click 
 the options below for more information
image53.gif
Properties

The Properties menu option opens the Top Properties area. There are 
 5 tabs in the Top Properties area:
Counter Top Tab
There are 8 options on the Counter Top tab:
image900.gif

Description 
		 -  The Description/Name of the selected Counter Top. 
 Material 
		 -  Allows you to select a  Material 
		 Schedule  for the selected Counter Top. 
 Texture 
		 -  Allows you to select a  Texture  
		 to apply to the Counter Top. 
 Edge 
		 Profile -  Allows you to select an Edge Profile for the 
		 selected Counter Top. 
 Top 
		 Elevation -  Allows you to modify the Elevation of the selected 
		 Counter Top. 
 Top 
		 Thickness -  Allows you to modify the Counter Top Thickness. 
 Splash 
		 Height -  Allows you to set the Height/Width of the Back 
		 Splash on the selected Counter Top. 
 Splash 
		 Thickness -  Allows you to modify the Splash Thickness.

Comment Tab

The Comment tab allows you to add a Comment/Note 
 on the selected Counter Top.
image901.gif
Dimensions Tab

There are four Dimension modes you can set 
 for the selected Counter Top here:
image902.gif

Each of these options refer back to the Counter 
 Tops Dimension Layer for specific Dimensioning instructions.

Automatic 
		 -  Utilizes the standard Counter Top Dimensioning. 
 Dimension 
		 Around Counter Top -  Dimensions around the Counter Top. 
 Dimension 
		 Counter Top Along Wall -  Dimensions the Counter Top along 
		 the Wall. 
 None 
		 -  Turns Dimensioning Off for the Counter Top.

Automatic 
		 -  Utilizes the standard Counter Top Dimensioning. 
 Dimension 
		 Around Counter Top -  Dimensions around the Counter Top. 
 Dimension 
		 Counter Top Along Wall -  Dimensions the Counter Top along 
		 the Wall. 
 None 
		 -  Turns Dimensioning Off for the Counter Top.

Automatic 
		 -  Utilizes the standard Counter Top Dimensioning. 
 Dimension 
		 Around Counter Top -  Dimensions around the Counter Top. 
 Dimension 
		 Counter Top Along Wall -  Dimensions the Counter Top along 
		 the Wall. 
 None 
		 -  Turns Dimensioning Off for the Counter Top.

Automatic 
		 -  Utilizes the standard Counter Top Dimensioning.

Automatic 
		 -  Utilizes the standard Counter Top Dimensioning.

Dimension 
		 Around Counter Top -  Dimensions around the Counter Top.

Dimension 
		 Around Counter Top -  Dimensions around the Counter Top.

Dimension 
		 Counter Top Along Wall -  Dimensions the Counter Top along 
		 the Wall.

Dimension 
		 Counter Top Along Wall -  Dimensions the Counter Top along 
		 the Wall.

None 
		 -  Turns Dimensioning Off for the Counter Top.

None 
		 -  Turns Dimensioning Off for the Counter Top.
Cutouts Tab

Displays and allows removal of Cutouts that 
 are on the selected Counter Top.
image903.gif

Overrides 
 Tab

This Tab allows you to View and/or Remove 
 any Overrides that may be present on the selected Counter Top.
image904.gif
